mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getMaintenanceHistoryInfo */ SELECT a.history_id historyId, d.status boothStatus, h.code_name boothStatusName, g.loc_state locState, c.group_id groupId, d.group_name groupName, a.subject subject, a.booth_id boothId, c.booth_name boothName, a.create_dt createDt, a.contents contents, a.creator creator, e.first_name creatorName, a.claim_type claimType, b.code_name claimTypeName, a.claim_status claimStatus, f.code_name claimStatusName, a.attach_file attachFile, a.update_dt updateDt, a.pst_street_no pstStreetNo, a.pst_suburb pstSuburb, a.pst_state pstState, a.pst_postcd pstPostcd FROM ptm_maintenance_history a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'CLAIM_TYPE') b ON a.claim_type = b.code_value LEFT OUTER JOIN ptm_booth_info c ON a.booth_id = c.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.history_id, b.booth_id, b.booth_name, b.group_name, b.status FROM ptm_maintenance_history a, (SELECT a.booth_id, a.booth_name, b.group_id, b.group_name, a.status FROM ptm_booth_info a, ptm_booth_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.group_id) b WHERE a.booth_id = b.booth_id) d ON a.history_id = d.history_id LEFT OUTER JOIN frwk_cmm_userinfo e ON e.user_id = a.creator LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'CLAIM_STATUS') f ON a.claim_status = f.code_value LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT loc_state, booth_id from ptm_booth_info) g ON g.booth_id = a.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'BOOTH_STATUS') h ON d.status = h.code_value WHERE a.history_id = #{historyId}

/* QUERY ID : getMaintenanceHistoryList */ SELECT a.history_id historyId, g.loc_state locState, c.group_id groupId, d.group_name groupName, a.subject subject, a.booth_id boothId, c.booth_name boothName, a.create_dt createDt, a.contents contents, a.creator creator, e.first_name creatorName, a.claim_type claimType, b.code_name claimTypeName, a.claim_status claimStatus, f.code_name claimStatusName, a.attach_file attachFile, a.update_dt updateDt, a.pst_street_no pstStreetNo, a.pst_suburb pstSuburb, a.pst_state pstState, a.pst_postcd pstPostcd, d.groupUse, d.boothUse FROM ptm_maintenance_history a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'CLAIM_TYPE') b ON a.claim_type = b.code_value LEFT OUTER JOIN ptm_booth_info c ON a.booth_id = c.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.history_id, b.booth_id, b.booth_name, b.group_name, b.groupUse, b.boothUse FROM ptm_maintenance_history a, (SELECT a.booth_id, a.booth_name, b.group_id, b.group_name, b.use_yn groupUse, a.use_yn boothUse FROM ptm_booth_info a, ptm_booth_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.group_id) b WHERE a.booth_id = b.booth_id) d ON a.history_id = d.history_id LEFT OUTER JOIN frwk_cmm_userinfo e ON e.user_id = a.creator LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'CLAIM_STATUS') f ON a.claim_status = f.code_value LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT loc_state, booth_id from ptm_booth_info) g ON g.booth_id = a.booth_id WHERE d.groupUse = 'Y' AND d.boothUse = 'Y' AND c.group_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM ptm_booth_info WHERE group_id = #{groupId} ) AND a.booth_id = #{boothId} AND a.creator = #{creator} AND a.claim_status = #{claimStatus} AND a.claim_type = #{claimType} AND g.loc_state = #{pstState} ORDER BY a.claim_status desc, a.create_dt desc

/* QUERY ID : getTechnicianList */ SELECT a.user_id userId, a.passwd passwd, a.pwdfail_cnt pwdfailCnt, a.first_name firstName, a.middle_name middleName, a.last_name lastName, a.addr_street addrStreet, a.addr_suburb addrSuburb, a.addr_state addrState, a.addr_zipcd addrZipcd, a.mobile_phone mobilePhone, a.telephone telephone, a.email email, a.sex sex, a.birth_dt birthDt, a.ext_col1 extCol1, a.ext_col2 extCol2, a.ext_col3 extCol3, a.ext_col4 extCol4, a.ext_col5 extCol5, a.use_yn useYn, a.create_dt createDt, a.modify_dt modifyDt, a.login_dt loginDt, a.picture_file pictureFile FROM frwk_cmm_userinfo a WHERE a.user_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT creator FROM ptm_maintenance_history)
/* QUERY ID : getNewMaintenanceHistoryId */ SELECT (coalesce(max(history_id), 0) + 1) FROM ptm_maintenance_history
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : updateMaintenanceHistory */ UPDATE ptm_maintenance_history SET subject = #{subject}, booth_id = #{boothId}, contents = #{contents}, claim_type = #{claimType}, claim_status = #{claimStatus}, attach_file = #{attachFile}, pst_street_no = #{pstSuburb}, pst_suburb = #{pstStreetNo}, pst_state = #{pstState}, pst_postcd = #{pstPostcd}, update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE history_id = #{historyId}
